column5: A perfect space to connect with other travelers or for groups up to 10, CamperVanAustin provides a funky, community style feel. Boasting 3 restored campers situated around a giant, stone fire pit and lights strung overhead, CamperVanAustin is the ultimate Austin destination. Just 10 minutes to downtown, it's the perfect spot for those seeking the convenience to the city, yet crave a relaxed, outdoor environment to unwind.
column8: Glamp Austin Style in Your Own Miss Daisy!
